class.name: SetOperations
class.description: Set Operations methods. They Receives the two sets, and the less than comparison function.

method.name: diference_op
method.description: Operates the [param set_0] - [param set_1] and returns the result [Set] organized with less than function [param comp].

method.name: intersection_op
method.description: Operates the [param set_0] ∩ [param set_1] and returns the result [Set] organized with less than function [param comp].

method.name: union_op
method.description: Operates the [param set_0] U [param set_1] and returns the result [Set] organized with less than function [param comp].

method.name: xor_op
method.description: Operates the [param set_0] ⊕ [param set_1] and returns the result [Set] organized with less than function [param comp].
